title: What are the 10 most profitable blogging ideas? - Quora

response.answer_text: basically I advising you that if you’re beginner in blogging, should choose your knowledge according topics that suitable and after you will have experiece in this stream for example - health tips, tutorials, recipes etc. Now here, , The 10 most profitable blogging ideas- Architecture blogNews blogProducts review blogJobs search BlogHealth tips blogTutorial types blogEducation blogLive classes blogAffiliate marketingE book blog
